issue.title: rtrings.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.7

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

Mobile

https://www.rtings.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

_No response_

_No response_

_No response_

_No response_

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

trackers:

https://www.rtings.com/api/event

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
im thinking this might be a tracker as well. dont see it breaking anything by blocking it

issue.title: open.spotify.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://open.spotify.com/playlist/30ItA1hHyulAM5zsJnQuL4](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2Fplaylist%2F30ItA1hHyulAM5zsJnQuL4) ### Comment > on spotify, the ad will not play and cannot be skipped. Adguard used to just block ads, now it blocks their content, not their existence. The ads are there, but they can't be played or skipped. I have to close the browser and restart spotify to escape the loop. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/cobvn0qt628swo0gs4wc8so0sc0k48wclfrwf0b1l4.png?nc=1)

### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.4.18 System version: | Windows 10 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Other extensions used: | none

issue.title: www.twitch.tv

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: open.spotify.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://open.spotify.com/playlist/30ItA1hHyulAM5zsJnQuL4](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fopen.spotify.com%2Fplaylist%2F30ItA1hHyulAM5zsJnQuL4) ### Comment > on spotify, the ad will not play and cannot be skipped. Adguard used to just block ads, now it blocks their content, not their existence. The ads are there, but they can't be played or skipped. I have to close the browser and restart spotify to escape the loop. ### Screenshots
